dcterms:creator: Mana Ihori
Akihiko Takashima
Ryo Masumura
dcterms:description: A parallel corpus for Japanese spoken-to-written style conversion, specifically designed for training models in spoken-text normalization tasks.
dcterms:title: CJSW (Parallel corpus for Japanese spoken-to-written style conversion)

dcterms:description: Unpaired written-style text data prepared by the authors using a home-made crawler, consisting of one million sentences filtered from various web pages.
dcterms:title: Japanese web text (unpaired written-style text data)

dcterms:description: Paired data of a Japanese dialect (Tohoku-ben) and standard Japanese, prepared by the authors using crowd-sourcing for dialect conversion tasks.
dcterms:title: Paired data of a Japanese dialect (Tohoku-ben) and standard Japanese
